args: You train with a fierce dedication,\nPrince {player_name}.
Is such training so you might\nbetter stand against the Empire?
That's right—and I won't stop until I'm\nstrong enough to take back everything\nthat matters to me.
A bold viewpoint which I applaud.
Might you be willing to tell me more of\nyour relationship with the Empire?
I don't want to drag you into our problems.
A stance your foes clearly do not share,\nseeing as how they appointed someone\nfrom another world as a commander.
It seems they will stop at no lengths to\nsee you defeated, and I cannot help\nbut wonder why.
Although perhaps this is not an issue\nfor an outsider like myself.
No, it's fine. ...And truth be told,\nyou might even be more connected\nto all of this than I first assumed.
So let me fill you in...
...So your home was destroyed\nand your family stolen from you?
Yes—and so I fight to reclaim it all.
One day, my sister will be free and my\nkingdom will know peace once more.
I fear your story hits closer to home\nthan I had anticipated.
For you see, I went through\nsomething very similar.
I lost my kingdom, and only survived\nthanks to my elder sister.
I spent a long time fighting\nto reclaim my country...
Just as you are doing now.
Coincidences are funny things,\nare they not?
I never thought I would stumble upon\nsomeone so similar to myself.
If you don't mind me asking,\nwhat became of your country?
We fought a fearsome war, but eventually\nmy kingdom knew peace once more.
...Heh. I'm not sure why I was so\nrelieved to hear that just now.
Perhaps it serves as further proof\nof your inherent goodness.
You're about the same age as me,\nand yet I feel like you've already\nlived twice the life that I have.
I can see why people started\ncalling you the Hero-King.
How do you know that name?!
Prince Alfonse said people call you that.\nEr, was he wrong?
No, but I feel even greater shame\nhearing it spoken by you.
That name implies I ended the war alone,\nand yet it would still rage on today\nwithout the aid of all my friends.
Perhaps I was guided to this world\nin order to help someone in the\nsame way my friends helped me.
...Someone like a prince in a very\nsimilar predicament to my old self,\nfor example.
It would certainly explain a great many\nof the coincidences.
Ordinarily, my being in a different world\nlike this would be impossible.
And yet, the impossible has happened.
I cannot state for certain that my purpose\nhere is to aid in your quest.
But I promise you this: For so long as I\nAM here, I will do all I can to help you.
Thank you, Prince Marth.\nThat means a great deal.
If I can provide even the smallest aid,\nyou have but to let me know.
I swear to fight with a strength\nthat brings glory to Altea!
